channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP iCommerce – the first interactive ecommerce for wordpress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP iCommerce – the first interactive ecommerce for wordpress

item.title: CVE-2021-24402|2024-08-03T19:28:24.015Z -- unknown -- wp%20icommerce%20%E2%80%93%20the%20first%20interactive%20ecommerce%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Orders functionality in the WP iCommerce WordPress plugin through 1.1.1 has an `order_id` parameter which is not sanitised, escaped or validated before inserting to a SQL statement, leading to SQL injection. The feature is available to low privilege users such as contributors
